plot: Sophie and Louis are in love. Anton is Louis best friend and Sophie's next-door neighbour. Relationships of love and friendship are explored through the eyes of these young adults.
title: Les chroniques de l'autre
plot_es: Sophie and Louis are in love. Anton is Louis best friend and Sophie's next-door neighbour. Relationships of love and friendship are explored through the eyes of these young adults.
plot_en: Sophie and Louis are in love. Anton is Louis best friend and Sophie's next-door neighbour. Relationships of love and friendship are explored through the eyes of these young adults.
